subject: ITC and Franks Box experiments LIVE
author: Kay Peterson
full_text:
The following is an email sent to you by an
 administrator of "livescifi.TV". If this message is
 spam, contains abusive or other comments you find

 board at the following address:

Include this full email (particularly the
 headers). 

Message sent to you follows:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Join livescifi.tv for their Spirit Communication
 Series as they perform interactive ITC and Franks
 Box experiments LIVE.  The broadcast will be
 begin Tuesday at 8:15pm pst.

See you there!

-the livescifi.tv team.
